name: Carprp
description:
Carprp is an immersive fish life simulation with highly detailed features and refined controls.  This game has been designed specifically to be conducive to a state of carpatonic bliss.

"Honey, I'm larping!" no more, you'll be pulling so many babes when you say...

"Honey, I'm carping!"

The image of a carp that I used is not mine, it was procured via USFWS.

1996 Softmedia Techware.
